column1: 132311,Occupational Health and Safety Manager,,"Advise communities or institutions regarding health or safety issues
column3: Analyse data to identify trends or relationships among variables
column5: Analyse operational data to evaluate operations, processes or products
column7: Consult with others regarding health and safety associated with equipment or facilities
column9: Design public or employee health programs
column13: Inspect work environments to ensure safety
column17: Investigate system, equipment or product failures
column19: Train employees on environmental awareness, conservation or safety topics",nan
